subject: Concussions
Sports Medicine
Athletics and Sports
Education and Schools
lead_paragraph: A new study released in The British Journal of Sports Medicine has again raised questions on how strictly concussions, and post-concussive recovery, should be regulated in youth sports.
snippet: A new study released in The British Journal of Sports Medicine has again raised questions on how strictly concussions, and post-concussive recovery, should be regulated in youth sports.
